text: want to see the papers we need to know
what he's actually returned as a tax
return we need to know why he put this
money overseas in the first place and
whether he made anything out of it or
not before 2010 when he became prime
minister these are questions that he
must answer I think there is a question
for Parliament there there is a question
for parliamentary Standards to question
him on this there is a question big
questions that have to be put to him by
Parliament and that surely is the
function of parliament do you think he's
been lying in any way about the money
that we've had in the past I think he
took an awful long time to say what
money he had in those trusts what money
was given to him by his family what
money he's received as a result of it
and what taxes paid on it there's been a
series of rather changing stories coming
out of Downing Street there's been
roughly a statement every 18 to 24 hours
since last Monday on this I don't know
why couldn't say the whole thing last
Monday but he's still not finished yet
because he hasn't actually said exactly
how much tax he did or didn't pay
